title: `[aria-*]` attributes do not match their roles
description: Each ARIA `role` supports a specific subset of `aria-*` attributes. Mismatching these invalidates the `aria-*` attributes. [Learn more](https://web.dev/aria-allowed-attr/).

node.snippet: <nav role="navigation" class="toc-subnav usa-accordion" aria-multiselectable="true" aria-label="Table of contents subnavigation">
node.nodeLabel:
TABLE OF CONTENTS
Designing Accessible Courthouses
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-multiselectable="true"
